sentence.Network_en: Her prose style is not always felicitous; she tends to repetition.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的行文风格并非总是恰到好处，往往爱重复。

sentence.Network_en: She played him -- sometimes delicately, sometimes with a less felicitous touch.
sentence.Network_cn: 她吊着他 -- 有时温柔地, 有时手法就不那么巧妙.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《GMAT600分词汇》第五课 ... feign v.假装，虚构 felicitous a.恰当的，巧妙的 feline a.猫科的.
最新GMAT词汇精选 - 豆丁网 ... feign v． 假装，伪装 felicitous adj． （话语等）适当的，得体的 feline adj． 猫科的.
贴_百度百科 ... 贴切[ apt;felicitous;appropriate;suitable;proper] 粘附；附着[ glue;stick on;paste on].
新东方教育科技集团 > 新东方 > 详细信息 ... Gospel 福音，真理，信条 Felicitous （措辞）巧妙的 Timeless 永恒的.

list.abs: Felgea 费尔吉亚牌手表felicitous plant 灵芝草Felidie 飞丽迪亚牌手表
I felicitate myself on my narrow escape ., 我庆幸自己死里逃生.
he felicitated himself that he had passed the entry examination .他庆幸自己通过了入学考试。
say exactly 准确地表明say felicitously 贴切地表明say flatly 断言

entry.tran: (话语、想法等)妥当的，合宜的，贴切的
entry.def: If you describe a remark or idea as felicitous, you approve of it because it seems particularly suitable in the circumstances.

example.ex: Her prose style is not always felicitous; she tends to repetition.
example.tran: 她的行文风格并非总是恰到好处，往往爱重复。

means.word_mean: 1. exhibiting an agreeably appropriate manner or style;

auth_sentence.content: In the refinement of their highly educated...benevolent and felicitous lives.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the refinement of their highly educated...benevolent and felicitous lives.

auth_sentence.content: Davies' more minor interpolations are usually pretty deft and sometimes downright felicitous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Davies' more minor interpolations are usually pretty deft and sometimes downright felicitous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Davies' more minor interpolations are usually pretty deft and sometimes downright felicitous.

auth_sentence.content: He is making an assumption that only one base pair change will have a felicitous result.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is making an assumption that only one base pair change will have a felicitous result.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is making an assumption that only one base pair change will have a felicitous result.

sentences.en: Nationalization is a word which is neither very felicitous nor free from ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 国有化是个既不十分贴切,意义也颇含糊的用语。
